content: We first took an oath to defend the constitution of the United States - not an oath to break the law. Then we were taught that the Uniform Code of Military Justice and the Geneva Convention forbid torture. That oath taken is an affirmation that lives forever. Breaking it is not an option. The law will prevail, reguardless of all the spin.
